sourcesContent:
import { Image } from '@chakra-ui/image'
import { Badge, Box, Divider, Flex, HStack, Link, Stack, Text } from '@chakra-ui/layout'
import React, { memo, useCallback, VFC } from 'react'
import { useHistory } from 'react-router'

const AnimeCard = () => {
    return (
        <>
            <Link _hover={{opacity: 0.8}} >
                <Box w='350px' h='450px' bg='white' borderRadius='10px' m={4}　>
                    <Image bg='red' borderRadius='10px 10px 0 0' w='100%'　h='70%' objectFit='cover'/>
                    <Flex align='flex-start' mb={3}>
                        <HStack direction="row" mr='5px'>
                            <Badge p={1} variant='solid' colorScheme='green'>
                                
                            </Badge>
                        </HStack>
                        <Text fontSize="xs">テスト</Text>
                    </Flex>
                    <Stack ml='5px' spacing={1}>
                        <Text fontSize="md">テスト</Text>
                        <Text fontSize="xs">テスト</Text>
                    </Stack>
                </Box>
            </Link>
        </>
    )
}

export default AnimeCard
